假設 $at 為 r31($ra)

j Jump //30
000010 00000000000000000001111000

bgtz $at, no_swap //+3
000111 11111 00000 0000000000000011

bgtz $at, next_turn //+1
000111 11111 00000 0000000000000001

j inner //13
000010 00000000000000000000110100

bne  $t1, $0, outer //-20 
000101 00001 00000 1111111111101100

j End  //36 
000010 00000000000000000010010000

beq  $t1, $t2, Loop //-3
000100 00001 00010 1111111111111101

j bubble //5
000010 00000000000000000000010100
